Director: Camilla Belle, Maritte Lee Go, Chris von Hoffmann, Joe Sill, Jess Varley
Producer: Maurice Fadida, Eric B. Fleischman, Jess Varley
Screenwriter: Camilla Belle, Chris von Hoffmann, Joe Sill, Jess Varley, Maritte Lee Go, Broderick Engelhard
Rating: R (Some Sexual References|Some Disturbing Material|Language Throughout|Violence)
Synopsis: Suffering from extreme phobias, five dangerous patients get put to the ultimate test under the supervision of a crazed doctor and his quest to weaponize fear.
Title: Phobias
